main event: A silver-colored, round object the size of a silver dollar was observed stationary overhead in Herington, Kansas on March 3, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as being silver in color.
The object was reported to be the size of a silver dollar.
The object was observed to be stationary overhead.
The report indicates the sighting may have been of a balloon.
sighted object: a round, silver-colored object the size of a silver dollar
